verses.verse: <S%G5279>Remind<s%> them to be <S%G5293>subject<s%> to <S%G746>rulers,<s%> to <S%G1849>authorities,<s%> to be <S%G3980>obedient,<s%> to be <S%G2092>ready<s%> for <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>deed,<s%>

For we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4218>once<s%> were <S%G453>foolish<s%> <S%G2249>ourselves,<s%> <S%G545>disobedient,<s%> <S%G4105>deceived,<s%> <S%G1398>enslaved<s%> to <S%G4164>various<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%> and <S%G2237>pleasures,<s%> <S%G1236>spending<s%> our <S%G1236>life<s%> in <S%G2549>malice<s%> and <S%G5355>envy,<s%> <S%G4767>hateful,<s%> <S%G3404>hating<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>
But <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G5544>kindness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G4990>Savior<s%> and [His] <S%G5363>love<s%> for <S%G5363>mankind<s%> <S%G2014>appeared,<s%>

He <S%G4982>saved<s%> us, not on the <S%G1537>basis<s%> of <S%G2041>deeds<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G4160>done<s%> in <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> but <S%G2596>according<s%> to His <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> by the <S%G3067>washing<s%> of <S%G3824>regeneration<s%> and <S%G342>renewing<s%> by the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%>

that being <S%G1344>justified<s%> by His <S%G5485>grace<s%> we might be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to [the] <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

<S%G3588>This<s%> is a <S%G4103>trustworthy<s%> <S%G3056>statement;<s%> and <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> I <S%G1014>want<s%> you to <S%G1226>speak<s%> <S%G1226>confidently,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that <S%G3588>those<s%> who have <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> may be <S%G5431>careful<s%> to <S%G4291>engage<s%> in <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>deeds.<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> are <S%G2570>good<s%> and <S%G5624>profitable<s%> for <S%G444>men.<s%>

But <S%G4026>shun<s%> <S%G3474>foolish<s%> <S%G2214>controversies<s%> and <S%G1076>genealogies<s%> and <S%G2054>strife<s%> and <S%G3163>disputes<s%> about the <S%G3544>Law;<s%> for they are <S%G512>unprofitable<s%> and <S%G3152>worthless.<s%>
<S%G3609>knowing<s%> that <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G5108>man<s%> is <S%G1612>perverted<s%> and is <S%G264>sinning,<s%> <S%G1510>being<s%> self-condemned.

<S%G3752>When<s%> I <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G734>Artemas<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%> to you, <S%G4704>make<s%> <S%G4704>every<s%> <S%G4704>effort<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to me at <S%G3533>Nicopolis,<s%> for I have <S%G2919>decided<s%> to <S%G3914>spend<s%> the <S%G3914>winter<s%> <S%G1563>there.<s%>

<S%G4709>Diligently<s%> <S%G4311>help<s%> <S%G2211>Zenas<s%> the <S%G3544>lawyer<s%> and <S%G625>Apollos<s%> on their <S%G4311>way<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that <S%G3367>nothing<s%> is <S%G3007>lacking<s%> for them.

And let our [people] <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> to <S%G4291>engage<s%> in <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%> to meet <S%G316>pressing<s%> <S%G5532>needs,<s%> that they may not be <S%G175>unfruitful.<s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are with me <S%G782>greet<s%> you. <S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G5368>love<s%> us in [the] <S%G4102>faith.<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all.<s%>
